who: Our Holy Father Nicholas, Archbishop of Myra in Lycia, the Wonderworker
intro: On the sixth day of the same month, we commemorate our holy father Nicholas, Archbishop of Myra in Lycia, the Wonderworker.

who: The Holy New Martyr Nicholas the Karamanos
intro: On the same day we commemorate the Holy New Martyr Nicholas the Karamanos, who suffered martyrdom in Smyrna in the year 1657.
